offline.reason: Some features may not be available while you're disconnected

unhandled_error.title: Oooops!
unhandled_error.subtitle: We did not expect to see an error like this!

providers.fakesso: Sign in with Fake SSO Provider

username.label: Email Address
username.validation: Must be a valid email address

password.label: Password
password.validation: Must be a between 8 and 200 chars, with 3: number, lowercase, uppercase or special characters

errors.account_locked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
errors.account_unverified: Your account has not been verified yet. Please check your email for a verification link first.
errors.mfa_required: You must complete multi-factor authentication to sign in.

email_address.label: Email Address
email_address.validation: Must be a valid email address

password.label: Password
password.validation: Must be a between 8 and 200 chars, with 3: number, lowercase, uppercase or special characters

confirm_password.label: Confirm Password
confirm_password.validation: Must be exactly the same as the password above

terms.label: By creating this account, you are agreeing to the <1>{{terms}}</1>, and <2>{{privacy}}</2> of SaaStack
terms.validation: You must agree to the terms of service

confirmation_message.title: Check Your Email
confirmation_message.message: We've sent a confirmation email to your inbox. Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

steps.step1: Check your email inbox (and spam folder)
steps.step2: Look for an email from SaaStack
steps.step3: Click the confirmation link in the email

troubleshoot.question: Didn't receive the email?
troubleshoot.answer: It may take a few minutes to arrive. If you still don't see it, check your spam folder or contact support.

errors.token_missing: This registration link is invalid. Please check your email.

success.title: Registration Confirmed!
success.message: Your account has been successfully registered, please sign in.

errors.token_expired: Your registration link has expired. Please request to send a new one.
errors.token_used: You are already registered. Please sign in.

resend.title: Resend Confirmation
resend.success: We have sent you a new confirmation email. Please check your email.

errors.token_used: This registration link is invalid, and cannot be used to resend a confirmation email. Please check your email.

errors.account_locked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
errors.account_unverified: Your account has not been verified yet. Please check your email for a verification link first.
errors.mfa_required: You must complete multi-factor authentication to sign in.
errors.oauth2: You could not be authorized by {{provider}}, error was: {{error}}.

hints.ownership: This is your (one and only) personal organization. You cannot delete it, you cannot leave it, and you cannot invite others into it
hints.switch_default: Switch to this as your current organization
hints.edit: Switch to this as your current organization

errors.forbidden: The current user may not have access to this organization at this time, please reauthenticate

errors.invalid_image: The image can only be a jpeg, png, or gif, and no larger than 100MB

confirmation.title: Organization Created
confirmation.message: Your organization has been created, but you will first need to logout and sign in again to access it.

errors.invalid_domain: Your email address cannot be used to create a shared organization, it potentially represents a personal or temporary email address
errors.duplicate_domain: Somebody from your organization may have already created an organization for your company email address. Contact your company administrator to get invited to that organization

locale.label: Language
locale.validation: You must select a language, e.g. en, or en-US

timezone.label: Time zone
timezone.validation: you must select a valid IANA time zone, e.g. America/New_York

errors.invalid_image: The image can only be a jpeg, png, or gif, and no larger than 100MB
